source.description: Harvest cells and wash in cold 1X PBS

Resuspend cells in
of ice-cold SB.

.

.

source.body: Volume of GSB should be at least 5 times the volume of cell pellet

source.description:
Vortex lightly while adding
of LyB

Incubate on ice for
Add
of LyB and centrifuge
.

Flick to loosen pellet and resuspend in
of LyB.
Centrifuge

Remove supernatant and resuspend in
of FB.
Take
for cell count.

Centrifuge
and resuspend using wide-end pipette tips in FB to a maximum concentration of 5x10^6 nuclei per
of FB.

Nuclei can be stored at
for months.

Prepare fresh 2x Nuclear run-on buffer (NRO). (
/sample)
  • 10 mM Tris-HCl ph8
  • 5 mM MgCl2
  • 300 mM KCl
  • 1 mM DTT
  • 500 μM ATP
  • 500 μM GTP
  • 500 μM 4-thio-UTP
  • 2 μM CTP
  • 200 μ/ml Superase-in
  • 1% Sarkosyl (N-Laurylsarcosine sodium salt solution)

Warm the NRO buffer at
.

Thaw nuclei
.

source.body: 5-10% drosophila nuclei can be added to your sample as spike-in if not using 4S-U labelled drosophila RNA in step 26.

source.description:

of thawed nuclei solution with
of 2xNRO buffer.
Pipette up and down 15 times using end-cut pipette tip.

Incubate
at
.

Add
Trizol LS.
Vortex.
Incubate
at
.

source.body: STOP POINT: Freeze with liquid nitrogen, and store at -80 °C

source.body: Can add 1-2 ul of 2 μg/μL glycogen to allow for visualization of pellet with lower RNA concentrations.

.

Completely remove ethanol and air-dry pellet.

source.body: Save 5 μl of unfragmented RNA to be run on TapeStation as a control for fragmented RNA and to check quality of RNA.

source.description: Add 5-10% of labelled spike-in RNA if using instead of drosophila nuclei.
Fragment RNA using Bioruptor with the following settings using: 1 cycle: 30 sec / 30 sec ON / OFF at high settings.
Transfer fragmented RNA to 2 ml tube.
Analyze fragmentation efficiency of fragmented versus unfragmented RNA on Agilent 2200 TapeStation.
Sonicated RNA can be snap-frozen in liquid nitrogen and stored at

Incubate RNA at
for
, then
for
.

Prepare Biotin-RNA mix in 1.5 ml tube. Follow the order:
up to
of fragmented RNA in
H20 up to
μl
HEPES pH 7.4
0.5M EDTA
Diluted MTS-Biotin

Incubate in the dark at
and
for
.

Add
of chloroform to the RNA-biotin in the 2 mL phase-lock tube and mix by manually shaking the tube.

Centrifuge
.
Remove supernatant.

Wash pellet with
of ice-cold 75% ethanol.
Centrifuge
.
Remove supernatant.

Spin quickly at
and remove remaining supernatant with 200 μl and 10 μl pipettes.

source.body: Biotinylated RNA should NOT dry.

source.description:

of nuclease-free water.

source.body: Biotinylated RNA can be stored at .

source.description:
Prepare Wash Buffer (WB):
  • 100 mM Tris pH 7.5
  • 10 mM EDTA pH 8.0
  • 1M NaCl
  • 0.1% (vol/vol) Tween-20

Leave half volume of WB at room temperature and heat the other half at
.
Prepare the beads:

Take
of beads per sample.

Wash the beads twice with 2 volumes (
per sample) of wash buffer.

Resuspend in 1 Volume (
per sample) of wash buffer.

Incubate at
for
.
Place on ice for
.

Add
of prepared Invitrogen streptavidin beads to
of RNA-biotin.

Incubate at
for
in rotation.

Transfer tubes to a magnetic rack.
Remove supernatant.
Do not disturb beads.

Wash at least 3 times with
of warm (
) WB.

Wash at least 3 times with
of room temperature WB.

Resuspend beads in
of 100 mM DTT and incubate
.

Transfer tubes to the magnetic rack.
Collect the 4-thio-labeled RNA in a new tube.
Repeat steps 62-63 and collect the eluted RNA in the same tube (50 μl total volume).

Add
nuclease-free water to the samples to final volume of 200 μl.

Use
to measure concentration of labelled RNA by Qubit fluorometer.
Libraries can be prepared with NEBNext Ultra II Directional RNA Library Prep or other library prep kits.

Centrifuge full speed
.

Transfer upper phase into new tube (appr
).
If needed at 1-2μl of 2 μg/μl Glycogen to allow for visualization of pellet with lower RNA concentrations.
Add 1/10 volume (20 μl) of 5 M NaCl and mix.
Add 1 volume (200 μl) of isopropanol and mix for 15 sec manually.

Add
of TURBO DNase buffer to the RNA-biotin.

Add
of TURBO DNAse.

Incubate at
for
.

Add
of inactivation reagent.

Incubate at
for
.

Centrifuge
.
Transfer RNA-biotin solution in a new tube.

Add
of chloroform to the labelled RNA and mix

Centrifuge
.
Transfer upper, aqueous phase into new 1.5 mL centrifuge tube.

Add
of 2 μg/μl glycogen and mix.
Add 1/10 volume (20 μl) of 5 M NaCl and mix.
Add 1 volume (200 μL) of isopropanol and mix.

Centrifuge
.
Remove supernatant.

Wash pellet with
of ice-cold 75 % ethanol.

Centrifuge
.
Remove supernatant.

Quick spin
and remove remaining supernatant with 10 μL pipette.

Resuspend RNA in
DEPC-treated H2O.
